title: Join in some late night ARAMs with me Ill be streaming it as well
body:
Send me a friend request and I will invite you.
Riot Superfoxman

I can also create a skype room and you can join in a gorup call my skype is "Riot Superfoxman"

I am also going to be streaming it here though I am not the best entertainer I will also have some music playing :)

Streaming here : http://www.twitch.tv/superfoxman
